languages.text: "Может, для начала объяснишь, что сейчас было?"
"Perhaps you could start by explaining what that was all about?"
languages.original_text: "Может, для начала объяснишь, что сейчас было?"

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps you could start by explaining what that was about?"
"Perhaps you could start by explaining what that was about?"
"Perhaps you could start by explaining what that was all about?"
"Perhaps you could start by explaining what that was all about?"

languages.text: 「まず、あれは何だったのか説明しろ」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you could start by explaining what that was all about?"

traits.locale_text: 「まず、あれは何だったのか説明しろ。」

languages.text: «¿Por qué no empieza explicándome a qué ha venido todo eso?».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you could start by explaining what that was all about?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué no empieza explicándome a qué ha venido todo eso?».

languages.text: “不如你先解释一下这到底是怎么回事吧？”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you could start by explaining what that was all about?"

traits.locale_text: “不如你先解释一下这到底是怎么回事吧？”

languages.text: "Vielleicht erklärt Ihr mir ja erst einmal, was das alles sollte?"
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you could start by explaining what that was all about?"

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht erklärt Ihr mir ja erst einmal, was das alles sollte?"

languages.text: « Vous pourriez peut-être commencer par m'expliquer de quoi il en retourne ? »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you could start by explaining what that was all about?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous pourriez peut-être commencer par m'expliquer de quoi il en retourne ? »

languages.text: "Belki de tüm bunların neyle ilgili olduğunu açıklayarak başlayabilirsin."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you could start by explaining what that was all about?"

traits.locale_text: "Belki de tüm bunların neyle ilgili olduğunu açıklayarak başlayabilirsin."
